scripts.dev: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:bot & wait
scripts.dev:api:free: npm run free-port -- 3001 && npm run dev:api
scripts.setup: cd api && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:migrate: cd api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: cd api && npx prisma db push
